website_summaries.verdict: This versatile portable closet offers unlimited configuration options to suit just about every storage need.
pros: Modular design is highly customizable and can be assembled in a variety of ways to fit any space or lifestyle
Comes with rails for hanging garments and numerous spacious cubes for foldable sundries
cons: Some owners had difficulty getting the doors lined up properly

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I like the portable wardrobe. It was easy to assemble. And is decently sturdy. I received it with a few missing pieces but when I contacted Megafuture they quickly responded and are sending me an 8 piece cube for extra parts. I really appreciate how they responded and took care of the problem. I definitely recommend Megafuture DIY
customer_reviews.author: Blue Jaye

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: perfect size and configuration. I would most definitely buy one over again if I needed one for any of my other rooms. This was a very good buy.Easy to install. I use some of it as a dresser and it has been holding up for a few weeks so far.And I use the other half as just a place to store random stuff
customer_reviews.author: Jolin

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome!!!! It’s very versatile. If you’re a creative artist type like I am, the sky’s the limit. Lol. Seriously, I’ve gotten great utility from it so far. In mid construction, I was so impressed by it that I ordered another one. I am using the one I have now for my clothes, hung & folded. The second one I ordered will be delivered tomorrow. I’ll use it for some books, my jewelry making kit, and all of my crafting tools & supplies. I love that it’s so easy to build and you can make it any shape/height to fit your needs and your space. Five stars!
customer_reviews.author: ZTLK

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I order the 20 cube clothet for my bedroom and im glad i did. This product is definitely worth the money. The cubes are easy to assemble and very roomy. I don't have anything bad to say. In fact, I love it so much I'm ordering the 8 cube one for my storage room.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Useful
customer_reviews.text: The item works as described and it's not too hard to put together. Once you've figured out the assembly pattern, the rest of the cubes follow suit. As pictured, you can stack the cubes horizontally as well as vertically. So technically, you can purchase more cubes and keep stacking as many that would fit in your chosen location. One quick note, I only received 6 cubes in my original order of 8 cubes but the seller sent me replacement order, hassle free.
customer_reviews.author: DWC

customer_reviews.title: The 8-cell wardrobe is easy to install
customer_reviews.text: The 8-cell wardrobe is easy to install. solid. There is no problem with filling up clothes. It is both dust-proof and space-saving. I put my shoes in half the space. Clean and sanitary. Simple and beautiful appearance is my favorite style.
customer_reviews.author: Doris

customer_reviews.title: To me this is a good product,beautiful and practical!it can hold many things and it ...
customer_reviews.text: To me this is a good product,beautiful and practical!it can hold many things and it doesn't take up a lot of space love it ...
customer_reviews.author: qinghua chen

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: We are using this in our nursery and it's amazing! Ships fast easy set up and looks as pictured
customer_reviews.author: Aidan Parker

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: The plastic is very thin and not solid. There were no directions and the doors have no way to connect them so you have to open them individually for the hanging side. I wouldn’t suggest putting any more than 10lbs per cube
customer_reviews.author: Robert Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to put together and not the sturdiest piece of furniture but it certainly works for a photography studio. I would not buy for a child’s bedroom since they may try to climb on it and it will not hold weight.
customer_reviews.author: Valvool

customer_reviews.title: not as expected
customer_reviews.text: do not expect this to be sturdy as it is not. it is easy to assemble but barely stable enough to use. if i had not destroyed my old closet setup i would send this back as unusable. doors do not half close and will only support 4 or 5 hangers of clothes in each section no more then 3 or 4 towels per cubby hole and only one set of king size sheets per cubby. All in all not a good product for me.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Moseley

customer_reviews.title: I wont give 5 stars just bec instructions are inaccurate ...
customer_reviews.text: I wont give 5 stars just bec instructions are inaccurate . Plus were missing 2 panels that even my 11 year old son noticed...Seller must address all these issue. I spent more than 5 hours putting it together. My fingers were wounded and red. too much effort and time invested. Material is okay
customer_reviews.author: Ana DeRochè

customer_reviews.title: Poor/ lacking instruction manual
customer_reviews.text: This set is a good deal for the price, but don’t expect it to be sturdy, nor is it easy to assemble. Assembly isn’t difficult, but mine came with the wrong instructions, not for the wardrobe I purchased, so there was a lot of frustrating trial and error before I got it put together. Overall, happy I purchased it, but I wish it was stronger. A few of the shelves and pieces have already broken.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was a horrible experience!
customer_reviews.text: The directions were unclear, including the pictures. It took my husband and I over 5 hours to put the closet together, and it looks horrible. The doors don't shut, the structure is wobbly, and, yes, I used the little mallet that came with the closet. Instead of putting a lovely new closet in our bedroom, we ended up putting the eye-sore in our pantry. At some point, I would like to take it apart and give it another go but I don't think my marriage could stand the stress.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Beyond Expectation!
customer_reviews.text: I expected this to be cheap Chinese made garbage, I love surprises though! It was very easy to put together and once assembled everything was very rigid and surprisingly strong. I have all of my clothes in it and it has been working to perfection! The build quality is good and the panels are strong. My only gripe is the doors. I wish there were magnets on the doors so they stay closed.
customer_reviews.author: Kimchi

customer_reviews.title: I am terrible at assembling anything
customer_reviews.text: I am terrible at assembling anything, and this was SO easy to put together. It is working great as extra clothes storage in my apartment. It looks nice in the room and is sturdy. I am very happy with the purchase and the price! The Seller is very easy to work with as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lilita

customer_reviews.title: Use YouTube to figure out how to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Initially gave this 1 star. Shipment received without enough panels. I changed my rating because the seller responded quickly to offer a discount. I think I can work around the missing panels and the unit works well to store craft room supplies. Instructions are not good, but YouTube came to the rescue.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: We just needed a bit more storage for 3 different bedrooms. The modular design is perfect for our purposes. There were not enough connector parts. I sent an email and received a response immediately. Since they did not have extra parts in their warehouse, they sent a box of "returned products" from other customer. This was fine with me since I only needed a few more connector pieces. The set they sent had enough pieces to build 1 extra wardrobe tower. We love the product. Simple clean looking design. Sturdy enough to hold bulky sweaters.
customer_reviews.author: vi

customer_reviews.title: Think wire with vinyl...
customer_reviews.text: I will use this product for now, but I don't expect it to last long. Assembly instructions are poor but you should be able to figure it out. Connections can be easily pulled apart and doors do not close well. Mine is holding sweaters, socks and lighter items. Heavier items are out of the question. I would not recommend this for long term use.
customer_reviews.author: LMG

customer_reviews.title: You need to send English instructions
customer_reviews.text: We got this item and no English instructions. I need the English instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Penny K. Bower

customer_reviews.title: not enough corner pieces for assembly
customer_reviews.text: It didn't come with enough corner pieces for assembly. I end up with not being able to assemble all pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Yang Xu

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: This was definitely a waste of $100 smh. It’s flimsy and keeps coming apart even after building it. It was a hassle to put together because it kept coming apart. This was awful. I am not satisfied with this product at all. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t even attempt to assemble because the parts were very flimsy. Very disappointed. Returned it promptly.
customer_reviews.author: VB

customer_reviews.title: Our 6 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Out little girl is 6 and just a tiny little thing. The ease in customizing allows her to reach her clothes and accessories, which makes her feel more grown up. Still working on matching but I will say being able to access all of her clothes in the same unit as well as having them organized is definitely a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Shukey Lafaye Phipps

customer_reviews.title: Portable Wardrobe
customer_reviews.text: I liked how quick I assembled this wardrobe. I also liked how organized I could be without actually stacking items on top of each other. I was disappointed at how flimsy the unit is.
customer_reviews.author: jstwrigt

customer_reviews.title: Not happy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really horrendous... instructions are not good at all.. need to use wood glue to make it stand..parts are not made right... absolutely not satisfied..
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: expensive, easy to damage
customer_reviews.text: I use it for clothes, but it breaks down quickly, and it's expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Boaz

customer_reviews.title: only for lighter weight clothes
customer_reviews.text: it literally fell apart when I hung winter clothes I gave it to Salvation Army
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Once you get the hang of putting it together,it's easy. Very cute, the only down fall is a couple doors won't stay shut. The magnets are crap
customer_reviews.author: Taylor cataldi

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $100 very dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in this product. It is not sturdy and won't stay together. I wish I would've spent $100 on something more effective. Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Marie Newcomb

customer_reviews.title: Not as stable or sturdy as it seems.
customer_reviews.text: This product sags when you put even light weight items in it. The doors do not stay closed.
customer_reviews.author: Rick R.

customer_reviews.title: Complicated and useless
customer_reviews.text: This product was horrible to put together and then fell apart breaking some items. Many hours wasted just to have to return.
customer_reviews.author: Barboza

customer_reviews.title: Portable wardrobe
customer_reviews.text: Is really not what I though it would be. I wouldn’t buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: mariela Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Was not easy to assemble and keep together with much weight in it.
customer_reviews.text: I would have rated poorly but they are refunding and that speaks volumes This would be perfect for a childs clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Fawn

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Very easy for my daughter to organize her things in her room on her own.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Wife says "it's not bad".
customer_reviews.text: My wife asked me to order this. She says it does what it was designed for, was a good deal and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Jerimiah Weekly

customer_reviews.title: Not what it appeared
customer_reviews.text: Not what I thought. Had cuts in the material. Could see through the material
customer_reviews.author: Donna Zuehlke

customer_reviews.title: Doors are hard!
customer_reviews.text: The doors are hard to open and they are stick to the frame.
customer_reviews.author: Customer M

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly made and structure weak once assembled. Easy falls down not safe around children.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: It did a perfect job and was easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to add storage and organization to my daughter's closet. It did a perfect job and was easy to put together. Kka
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This is garbage will never recommend to buy the doors did not fit simply garbage
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product information inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Be aware - this item does NOT come with enough panels to assemble the stated number of cubes. For example, the "16 cube" can only make 8 complete cubes, with the remaining space dedicated to a hanging wardrobe area. The picture of this product, showing 16 completed cubes, is completely false. The item's materials are okay but the seller should immediately update the title and post a more accurate picture, as the current stated sizes are extremely misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Allen

customer_reviews.title: This was a piece of crap!
customer_reviews.text: This was a bear to put together, pieces broke as we tried to assemble! It bent the metal frame under it's own weight. We ended up not even using it, because it would not stand up to the weight of it'self let alone of any clothes to be put in it. We ended up going to Ikea for something else that would hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Denise K. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: For the love of me, I cannot figure out how to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The Assembly would have been a breeze if it were to come with instruction in English. Nope, don't expect English in US now. It's all in an alien language. Even if you think you'd live with pictures, they don't really help either. Such a waste of time and energy really. High priced for the customer service and quality of the products. Pay $20 more and get a better one at IKEA. Pass on this one please.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your money
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of my worst purchases on Amazon ever. Very cheap, poor quality materials. Missing parts and several of the doors were broken. If I could return I would. Definitely not worth your money. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: SylB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby stuff.
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect for baby stuff. Roomy but space saving and very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Fagan

customer_reviews.title: Save your money, this is junk
customer_reviews.text: This would get zero stars if I could. This is junk and I’d return it if the window hadn’t closed tondo so. The intended room for it was under construction until 4 days ago and I’ve just gotten around to assembling it. The doors don’t align or close properly, pretty sure if you put anything on the “shelves” they’d break. Great concept, pictures make it look sleek and clean and modern, but it’s plastic, made in china junk. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren M Cox

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: This seemed like such a wonderful product to save space since the new studio I'm moving into doesn't have a closet, but it is HORRIBLE. The description is wrong, the actual product they sent did not match what they are advertising. The instructions that came with the box were a mess and asked to put parts together that DID NOT FIT TOGETHER. I spent so much time trying to put it together in so many different forms. I'm so annoyed by how badly designed it is. Just dont buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Gricet

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Instructions that were included in the box were horrible but overall sturdy and sleek looking
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Figuring out how to put it together. Then, it's great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this furniture. It's easy to assemble thought it does require a little bit of learning. Looks great and fills very sturdy. Greta value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jacques

customer_reviews.title: Keep your money!
customer_reviews.text: Very cheesy. Definitely does not hold the weight specified. No instructions in English...not even sure what language they were. Would never buy again....do not waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Robin L. Matthews

customer_reviews.title: A LOT of missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: I was sent half of the pieces & no directions. I'd like a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful! I am very glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin M.

customer_reviews.title: Great storage for $
customer_reviews.text: Great storage: easy video to help assemble. Pretty sturdy for price. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: KA Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart every time you bump it or store something ...
customer_reviews.text: Falls apart every time you bump it or store something that hits the sides. All the shelves just collapsed several time. Waist of money. Would never buy this brand again!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Belbeck

product_meta.title: JOISCOPE Portable Wardrobe for Hanging Clothes, Combination Armoire, Modular Cabinet for Space Saving, Ideal Storage Organizer Cube for Books, Toys, Towels(20-Cube)
feature_bullets: Modern Design: -Transparent white closed doors and walls. High quality material can perfectly meet a long-life and sturdy need.
ECO-material: -Environmental resin panels. Eco-friendly and chemical-free, zero methanol guaranteed and 24/7 Customer Service.
Multifunction: -Hanging or folded clothes, Deeper cubes can store up to 16-20 shirts each. storage of miscellaneous household items.
Easy Care: -Waterproof and dust-resistant; Easy Clean, Moveable by easy assembly and disassembly. With clear PDF instructions
Storage: -Each (smallest) cube supports up to 23lbs. measures in 15"(L) x 15"(H) x 19"(W). Built your own combinations for any space.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.1 out of 5 stars112 ratings3.1 out of 5 stars
